title: This "Perfect" Small-Space Patio Set Is Just $80 During The Home Depot's Sale
description: The price is unbeatable! READ MORE...
author: Nikol Slatinska
text: DecoratingShoppingNikol SlatinskaShopping Writer, HomeIn my role at Apartment Therapy, I'm most passionate about making my home look beautiful and organized and helping our readers do the same — often at a discount. Although I cover my fair share of newsy pieces, my work focuses on long-form service articles that help our audience…read morepublished nowWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Typically, if you want to find Black Friday-worthy deals outside of the month of November, you have to really look for them. But now that The Home Depot’s Spring Black Friday sale is live, you have countless amazing discounts at your fingertips on everything from large appliances to gardening tools to cleaning supplies. But if there’s one product category you absolutely have to check out, it’s definitely The Home Depot’s patio furniture. From full dining sets to cozy conversation sets, there’s something for every kind of outdoor space, large or small, and all for a steal.In looking through the markdowns, the best deal I saw was on the StyleWell four-piece wicker conversation set. Discounted to just $80, it’s a whopping 60% off and has great ratings, to boot. Plus, reviewers agree that the set looks great. Be sure to snag it before the sale is over and enjoy comfortable outdoor hangouts through the summer.What Is the StyleWell 4-Piece Wicker Patio Conversation Set?This set comes with an outdoor loveseat and two chairs, as well as a matching coffee table. Each piece has a rust-resistant steel frame covered by all-weather, dark brown wicker. The seats all have green cushions, which are made of weather-resistant polyester and feature stain-resistant covers. What’s more, the cushions’ deep green hue will match pretty much any outdoor space because it’s a natural color, and it contrasts nicely with the brown wicker.As for the set’s size, the largest piece is the love seat, which measures 43 inches long. Even if you have a small terrace or deck, you’ll likely have no problem fitting the entire set onto it and comfortably seating up to four people. The coffee table is also compact but makes a great spot for storing food and beverages. Plus, it has a spacious shelf under its surface for decor and outdoor essentials, like sunscreen, books, and sunglasses.What Home Depot Reviewers Are Saying “Bought this set for seating on a balcony. It works really well. It was a good price compared with similar sets, and I did worry the chairs might not be comfortable, but it’s great and pretty stylish overall. The cushions dry quickly, and you can set drinks and things on the table. It’s quite stable.” —cmccullo “Love this set. Very comfortable, sturdy construction, easy to assemble, and looks perfect!” —HomeDepotCustomer “This set has worked out perfectly for our family. It’s relatively compact, so it fits really well on our small-ish porch. It was very easy to assemble. The seats aren’t SUPER cushy, but there’s enough comfort that you’re not sore. It’s easy to wipe down the cushions, and the furniture still looks great after a few months in the sun. For the price, a true winner!” —Kate I’ve seen conversation sets for low prices online before, but never one this cute for only $80. I doubt that it’ll sell out, but you’ll still want to act fast to take advantage of the limited-time discount. Spring is here, anyway, so there’s no better time to upgrade your outdoor area.
html:
• Decorating
  • Shopping

Nikol SlatinskaShopping Writer, Home

In my role at Apartment Therapy, I'm most passionate about making my home look beautiful and organized and helping our readers do the same — often at a discount. Although I cover my fair share of newsy pieces, my work focuses on long-form service articles that help our audience…read more

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Typically, if you want to find Black Friday-worthy deals outside of the month of November, you have to really look for them. But now that The Home Depot’s Spring Black Friday sale is live, you have countless amazing discounts at your fingertips on everything from large appliances to gardening tools to cleaning supplies. But if there’s one product category you absolutely have to check out, it’s definitely The Home Depot’s patio furniture. From full dining sets to cozy conversation sets, there’s something for every kind of outdoor space, large or small, and all for a steal.

In looking through the markdowns, the best deal I saw was on the StyleWell four-piece wicker conversation set. Discounted to just $80, it’s a whopping 60% off and has great ratings, to boot. Plus, reviewers agree that the set looks great. Be sure to snag it before the sale is over and enjoy comfortable outdoor hangouts through the summer.

What Is the StyleWell 4-Piece Wicker Patio Conversation Set?

This set comes with an outdoor loveseat and two chairs, as well as a matching coffee table. Each piece has a rust-resistant steel frame covered by all-weather, dark brown wicker. The seats all have green cushions, which are made of weather-resistant polyester and feature stain-resistant covers. What’s more, the cushions’ deep green hue will match pretty much any outdoor space because it’s a natural color, and it contrasts nicely with the brown wicker.

As for the set’s size, the largest piece is the love seat, which measures 43 inches long. Even if you have a small terrace or deck, you’ll likely have no problem fitting the entire set onto it and comfortably seating up to four people. The coffee table is also compact but makes a great spot for storing food and beverages. Plus, it has a spacious shelf under its surface for decor and outdoor essentials, like sunscreen, books, and sunglasses.

What Home Depot Reviewers Are Saying

“Bought this set for seating on a balcony. It works really well. It was a good price compared with similar sets, and I did worry the chairs might not be comfortable, but it’s great and pretty stylish overall. The cushions dry quickly, and you can set drinks and things on the table. It’s quite stable.” —cmccullo

“Love this set. Very comfortable, sturdy construction, easy to assemble, and looks perfect!” —HomeDepotCustomer

“This set has worked out perfectly for our family. It’s relatively compact, so it fits really well on our small-ish porch. It was very easy to assemble. The seats aren’t SUPER cushy, but there’s enough comfort that you’re not sore. It’s easy to wipe down the cushions, and the furniture still looks great after a few months in the sun. For the price, a true winner!” —Kate

I’ve seen conversation sets for low prices online before, but never one this cute for only $80. I doubt that it’ll sell out, but you’ll still want to act fast to take advantage of the limited-time discount. Spring is here, anyway, so there’s no better time to upgrade your outdoor area.
